Summary: This document outlines the role of an Innovation and Learning Centre (ILC) Intern with a focus on analytics. The intern will have the opportunity to work closely with McKinsey's ILC and QuantumBlack teams in Singapore, providing capability building and piloting new digital solutions. The role involves collaborating with data science and engineering colleagues on analytics and AI engagements, as well as serving clients in building data analytics solutions. The preferred skills for this role include a degree in mathematics, physics, computer science, or data science, knowledge of digital technologies and operations, and strong problem-solving and project management skills. The intern will have the opportunity to learn about successful projections on real-world problems, build products alongside the engineering team, and use new technologies to solve complex data
